downloadTitle: Key Health Indicators: The Foundation for Maintaining Healthy Lync Servers
downloadDescription: Learn about KHI metrics in maintaining healthy servers for the various roles and functions in Lync 2013.
detailsSection: Key Health Indicators are performance counters with thresholds aimed at revealing user experience issues. Gathering KHI data is usually the first step to implementing the Call Quality Methodology (CQM), which is focused on ensuring a quality audio experience for Lync users.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: network Planning, Monitoring, and Troubleshooting with Lync Server
